title.rendered: 500 Pack 0.25 x 30mm, Hwato Acupuncture Needles Ultra Clean Traditonal Chinese Metal Handled

content.rendered:
This system reduces the issue of discarding the balance of needles from opened blisters at the end of treatment – providing peace of mind for clients and practitioners. Economical and environmentally friendly!

Hwato brand needles are China’s finest quality traditional Chinese style acupuncture needles.
Manufacturing takes place at the Suzhou Medical Appliance factory – China’s oldest, largest and most respected manufacturer of acupuncture devices.  Due to its impressive standards of quality, the factory has international certification through various national bodies such as the TGA of Australia, FDA of the USA, TUV Certificate of Germany, and ISO accreditation.

Suzhou takes pride in closely monitoring all stages of manufacture and quality control to meet their exacting standards. Through close consultation with the Chinese Medical community in China, the needle tip has been refined to its current double parabola’ shape, or ‘pine’ type needle tip.  This shape has been consistently shown to provide a smoother, more painless needling experience for both the patient and practitioner.  Consistency of the shape of the needle tip is ensured through a stringent polishing and angling production process.

Box of 500 sterile, disposable needles.

5 needles & 1 guide-tube per blister pack.

excerpt.rendered:
Low & fair prices for high quality goods
High customer satisfaction
Fast shipping, dispatched in four business days or less. Most metro orders are delivered within 1-4 working days.
100% secure shopping and safe checkout.
Australian trusted store, Australian based and owned. Your order is shipped from an Australian warehouse.
